title: description
Katy Perry & Snoop Dogg's: An undeniable mix between the T.N.T. and the Grunland. As fine as Katy Perry & Snoop Dogg's lookie.

title: notes
Katy Perry & Snoop Dogg's: Brandy, Curacao and a hint of babykaty.

title: pairing
Katy Perry & Snoop Dogg's: Katy Perry & Snoop Dogg have it with an undeniable Eggs, Scrambled and pain au chocolat.

title: serving_suggestion
Katy Perry & Snoop Dogg's: Stir with ice and strain. Drink to the fine sounds of California Gurls.
